ABSORB.Defintion: take in and understand fully (information, ideas, or experience)

BEG.Defintion: ask for, normally as a charity

COLOURFUL.Defintion: full of interest; lively and exciting

CONSCIOUS.Defintion: (of an action or feeling) deliberate and intentional

HAVE YOU BELIEVE.Defintion: want you to think, want you to believe

INHIBITS.Defintion: make (someone) self-conscious and unable to act in a relaxed and natural way

NEUROLOGICAL.Defintion: relating to the anatomy, functions, and organic disorders of nerves and the nervous system

NUANCED.Defintion: characterized by subtle shades of meaning or expression

ON THE FACE OF IT.Defintion: without knowing all of the relevant facts; apparently

PORING OVER.Defintion: be absorbed in reading or studying (something)

SPONGES.Defintion: a soft substance that is full of small holes and can absorb a lot of liquid, and is used for washing and cleaning
